data.name: ESP3D-TFT
data.description: ESP3D Firmware for ESP32 based TFT

last_commit.message:
Create sdkconfig

work around idf extension cannot find the sdkconfig for flashing
last_commit.author: Luc

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST] Support for MKS DLC32 MAX LCD [ESP-TFT35 v4.1]
issues.body:
Uses the following hardware:

SoC: ESP32-WROOM-32U-N8
Capacitive Touch Panel Controller: FT6336U (I2C)
3.5" Capacitive Touch Panel: CL35BC219-40A (SPI)
Resolution: 480x320 
USB-C: Wired to an onboard CH340C USB to serial chip 
RJ11 serial port: To the host CNC controller
1x Unpopulated space for a beeper
1x Extra Button

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/171dfd7e-8f87-436d-8ace-1dffe7be96e0)
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/529f10b9-d63f-4f92-bc49-c68285c9a8ea)
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/20a87c13-1197-4457-8514-f9c36363e433)

issues.title: The serial port cannot be connected to the printer, but the USB serial port can
issues.body: Has anyone else encountered this problem? I am certain that the hardware of the serial port is correct

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST]Add Lua interpreter support like in ESP3D
issues.body:
Lua interpreter support is implemented in ESP3D https://esp3d.io/ESP3D/Version_3.X/documentation/lua/

Add same support in ESP3D-TFT

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST]Add BTT GCODE thumbnails
issues.body:
It was raised to me that now BTT TFT support thumbnails in gcode it is even documented https://github.com/bigtreetech/BIGTREETECH-TouchScreenFirmware?tab=readme-ov-file#adding-gcode-thumbnails

I think it would be fun to add this feature also if possible - it would need to add an image decoder which is not an issue in theory
 I need to see the impact on low memory screens, but at first sight looks possible on others ^_^ TBC

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST]Add support of macro defined by webui on screen
issues.body:
Now Tft fw can read the preferences.json, so a screen listing defined macros should be available.

The question is where to display the macro button?

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST]Code review / refactoring / improvement
issues.body:
This is todo list of several topic that need to be done before release:

- <s>Use queue for values and process them to avoid racing conditions https://github.com/luc-github/ESP3D-TFT/blob/main/main/core/esp3d_values.cpp#L70-L72
and put the pop/clear the list in display task </s> (Done  :+1: ) 

-  Design different boot logo / splash for each target ( e.g: ESP3D Logo + Target name) to know from start what is display for

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST]Move to lvgl 9.0
issues.body:
I did some reading on migration guide and API description - the mechanism seems pretty identical, API is very close but there are a lot of renaming
I plan to really start to work on it when official 9.0 release is done and move to 9.x when first bug release is out

issues.title: [FEATURE REQUEST]Do better snapshot code with no memory need
[FEATURE REQUEST]WhatsApp Notification
issues.body: How to do is here https://www.callmebot.com/blog/free-api-whatsapp-messages/ - it is free and it use same way as others - so it is easy to implement

issues.title: [ENHANCEMENT]Add Pin interrupt support on FT5X06 when supported to save mcu time instead of doing permanent polling
issues.body:
Doing permament polling on touch to see if was pressed save mcu time on some solution (WT32-SC01 New Plus),  int pin for FT5X06 is available, but seems not working on my device (https://github.com/luc-github/ESP3D-TFT/discussions/1#discussioncomment-3762021), may be hardware issue ? 

If anyone know how to solve this with a working solution - feedback is welcome 😸

recent_commits.message:
Idf 5.1.5 (#78)

* Use idf 5.1.5
* Change vTaskDelay by esp3d_hal::wait for consistency
* Fix Scan not working due to API change
* Fix missing .enum_filter_cb for USB due to API change
* Add info.json and badge version
* Improve detection of connection to avoid race condition
* Add more flexible ack detection in case of data corruption
* Update littlefs from 1.6.0 to v1.14.8
* Update USB definition struct due to new API
* Update idf-setup.sh to use idf 5.1.5 in CI
* Adjust versions in code / readme / json

---------

Signed-off-by: Luc <8822552+luc-github@users.noreply.github.com>
recent_commits.author: Luc
